hero.sub: Hemostatics, sutures, pay-per-use drills and professional derma. 🇨🇳 China (Med): audited suppliers with competitive pricing and controlled quality. 🇰🇷 Korea (Beauty): leading manufacturers delivering the market's premium quality. Quotes in 24–48h, ANVISA/UDI docs verified and delivery SLAs.
hero.note: No public catalog. RFQ + private portal for approvers.

lines.title: Hemostatics
lines.desc: Bleeding control with complete documentation. 🇨🇳 China (Med): competitive pricing with audited quality.

lines.title: Sutures
lines.desc: Absorbable & non-absorbable with compatibilities and IFUs. 🇨🇳 China (Med): competitive pricing with audited quality.

lines.title: Drills PPU
lines.desc: Pay-per-use with neutral AFE, uptime ≥ 98%, 72h swap.

lines.title: Derma Pro (Beauty)
lines.desc: Premium clinical aesthetics — delivery focus across the markets below. 🇰🇷 Korea (Beauty): leading manufacturers with benchmark premium quality.

about.title: Clinical supply healthtech with global governance.
about.subtitle: We connect surgical and dermatology teams to audited manufacturers across Asia, providing logistics predictability, ANVISA/UDI compliance and an enterprise buying experience.
about.mission: Ensure critical supply with full compliance, transparent documentation and monitored SLAs for clinical engineering and procurement.

values.title: Frictionless compliance
values.desc: Document due diligence (ANVISA, UDI, ISO 13485, IFU/MSDS) before quoting plus ongoing shelf-life alerts.

values.title: Audited network
values.desc: Hong Kong hub with on-the-ground squads in Brazil and the Gulf to coordinate inspection, consolidation and final delivery.

values.title: Collaborative portal
values.desc: Workflow for clinical, sourcing and finance teams to approve each lot with full traceability.

about.quote: "We exist to give clinical teams predictability with end-to-end traceability."

howSteps.d: Send the RFQ with specifications, quantities and timelines.
Due diligence on ANVISA/UDI/ISO, compatibilities and shelf life.

self.complianceDesc: Regulatory transparency by default. Each proposal includes a technical dossier and tracking.
verifiedCriteria: IFU in local language when required
self.verifiedNote: No patient sensitive data is captured in the portal.
self.rfqSub: No public catalog. Send your needs and we return with technical comparison, verified docs and proposal within 24–48h.
rfqBullets: Technical comparison (material, risk class, compatibility, expiry)
self.rfqHint: After submitting, you can attach files via a secure link we send by email.

form.name: Name*
form.specsPH: Ex.: risk class, gauge/size, absorption, compatibility, current registration, reference brand...
form.regPH: Ex.: class II/III, mandatory docs, minimum shelf life...
form.legal: By sending you agree to our Terms and confirm no PHI is being shared.
form.errorRequired: Complete the required fields and review the highlighted data.
form.okMsg: We'll reply within 24–48h with comparison and proposal.

cases.d: Private hospital (SP) — hemostatics & sutures with scheduled replenishment.
Regional network — pay-per-use drills, 72h swap and minimum consumption.

self.sticky: 24–48h quotes with technical comparison and verified documentation.

footer.blurb: Clinical supply with compliance and speed. HQ 🇭🇰 Hong Kong.
